Method Detail



    



    Cache::CachePath
    


    
CachePath(
[string
$FileName = null] );

    



		
    Parameters
    
			
    $FileName
    
		
    Filename you want the path to, shortcut to detecting if file exists.
    
			
    Returns
    
		
    Path to the cache, false if FileName exists.
    

    Remarks
    

    Get cache Path
    

    Get absolute path to the cache, returns false if FileName exists.
    
	
    uses
    
		
    Cache::FileExist()
    
	
    access
    
		
    public

 );

    Cache::CleanupMaxAge
    


    
CleanupMaxAge(
 );

    



	
    Remarks
    

    Cleanup cache from old files
    

    Removes old files from the cache, see LocalSettings.php for settings.

    Cache::CleanupUnused
    


    
CleanupUnused(
 );

    



	
    Remarks
    

    Cleanup unused files from cache
    

    Removes old unused files from the cache, see LocalSettings.php for settings.  This functions indentifies files as unused if they havn't been accessed for a long time.
    
	
    usedby
    
		
    Cache::CleanupCache()
    
	
    access
    
		
    public
    
	
    [ Top ]
    

    



    Cache::FileExist
    


    
FileExist(
string
$FileName );

    



		
    Parameters
    
			
    $FileName
    
		
    Filename relative to cache.
    
			
    Returns
    
		
    Whether or not FileName exist.
    

    Remarks
    

    Does file exist in cache
    

    Returns true or false depending on whether or not FileName Exist in cache.
    
	
    usedby

    usedby

    Cache::FileURL
    


    
FileURL(
string
$FileName );

    



		
    Parameters
    
			
    $FileName
    
		
    Filename relative to cache.
    
			
    Returns
    
		
    Returns the URL of the file.
    

    Remarks
    

    Get file URL
